name: PROB_FILED_FORMS
description: Table of filed SmartForms and the corresponding Diagnosis (EDG) code at the time of filing.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of this Problem List entry.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FILED_FORM_ID
columns.description: SmartForm record ID of a form that has filed data for the problem

columns.name: FILED_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: RELATED_EDG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the problem at the time the form filed data for the problem.
